java.util.Optional.ofNullable: Returns an Optional describing the given value, if non-null, otherwise returns an empty Optional.
javafx.scene.input.ClipboardContent.putH: Puts an HTML String into the ClipboardContent.
javafx.scene.input.ClipboardContent.putS: Puts a plain text String into the ClipboardContent.
javafx.scene.input.Clipboard.getSystemCl: Gets the current system clipboard, through which data can be stored and retrieved.
javafx.application.Platform.runLater: Run the specified Runnable on the JavaFX Application Thread at some unspecified time in the future.
